title: How to Detect Deception - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/21/17
itunes:title: How to Detect Deception - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/21/17
description:
Guest host Connie Willis and retired US Marshall Mark McClish discuss statement analysis and the techniques he uses to determine if someone is lying or not.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
